snippet.title: Pinball Heroes: Hot Shots Golf - Albatross
snippet.description: In hot shots golf for pinball heroes, the fourth hole is a par 5 that is reachable in 2 with perfect wind conditions.  Fortunately in this game putting doesn't count as a stroke, lol.  You can make this even easier if you have trouble  hitting the 150y target by upgrading some other features of the table for additional yardage!
